attributes.action: Make all the Pubs, Bars & Clubs make Guinness Draught taste as good as in Ulster & Eire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Ulster & Eire Guinness Draught tastes so much better, but on the GB mainland Guinness Draught lacks that "Magic" flavour you only get in Ulster & Eire Pubs, Bars & Clubs. So please sign this and make the "magic" happen.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
